column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What I liked...they take reservations
column2: which is bomb because we came here for a birthday occasion and were seated straight away. I did enjoy their sangria. Granted
column3: I still think I make the world's best sangria
column4: but I was liking what we ordered. We started with their sangria of the day
column6: with white wine. Then we opted for the more traditional red wine sangria. If I had to choose between the two
column7: I would say the mango sangria was more my style
column8: but I've never been a red wine kind a gal
